name: GetAttributes
description: Read standard attributes encoded in the referenced object's name.

inputParameters.name: ref_crv
inputParameters.description: Referenced curve or line, Guid of curve or line in the active Rhino document.

outputParameters.name: ZVector
outputParameters.description: Vector defining the orientation of the cross-section (corresponds to the height dimension). If None, a default will be taken.

outputParameters.name: Width
outputParameters.description: Width of the cross-section (usually the smaller dimension).

outputParameters.name: Height
outputParameters.description: Height of the cross-section (usually the larger dimension).

outputParameters.name: Group
outputParameters.description: Name of a group or subassembly.
